description: A 14-year-old named http://anidb.net/ch2874 [Renton] lives with his mechanic grandfather. His life is thrown somewhat off-kilter when a mech called http://anidb.net/ch2958 [Nirvash] crashes into his house one day and a young girl called http://anidb.net/ch2875 [Eureka] pops up asking for help to repair it. Shortly after, the military mechs get involved...

REGULAR.description:
Renton Thurston leads a boring life for a fourteen-year-old boy, but that changes when his compact drive starts to glow with the word “Eureka” and a strange, beautiful girl crashes a mecha into his home.
Source: crunchyroll

While Renton tries to get the Amita Drive to Eureka and the Nirvash, he finds a new sense of determination. Once he finds Eureka emotions flair, the military attacks, and a strange power is unleashed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ブルー・スカイ・フィッシュ

REGULAR.description:
As tensions mount between the military and Gekkostate at the airport, Eureka teaches Renton how to detect Trapar particle waves. If the Gekko is going to escape the military blockade, the two of them are going to have to pull off a daring maneuver.
Source: crunchyroll

The Council of Sages discusses the Nirvash’s immense display of power and how it is connected to Adrock Thurston—Renten’s father. Meanwhile, Renton joins Gekkostate to get closer to Eureka, only to find himself at the bottom of the organization.
Source: crunchyroll

When a shopping trip with fellow Gekkostate members Talho and Hilda turns ugly, it’s up to Renton to pilot an LFO solo for the first time in order to keep everyone from getting into too much trouble.
Source: crunchyroll

Eureka’s “kids” pull a series of pranks on Renton, dead-set on keeping anyone from getting too close to the woman they call “Mama.” Meanwhile, Renton goes out on a dangerous mission without authorization from the rest of Gekkostate.
Source: crunchyroll

Renton gets sent on an important Gekkostate mission to deliver a dangerous package—but there’s something strange about the errand.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アブソリュート・デフィート

REGULAR.description:
On a shopping trip, Eureka, Renton, and a few others run into a woman named Tiptory. But when Holland appears and interrupts their meeting, it’s revealed that there’s more to Tiptory than meets the eye.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: グロリアス・ブリリアンス

REGULAR.description:
The Gekko lands in the ruins of Ciudades Del Cielo, where Renton tries to cut loose by lifting—much to Holland’s annoyance. When Renton disappears into the city, he discovers the secret behind Gekkostate’s formation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ペーパームーン・シャイン

REGULAR.description:
A huge Trapar wave is unleashed and Holland decides he and the others need to have a little fun lifting. When they end up at military base, though, Holland and Talho recall painful memories.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ハイアー・ザン・ザ・サン

REGULAR.description:
Gekkostate investigates a strange sphere that appeared in the sky. Eureka helps out, despite her declining health, and a new Nirvash shows up—typeTheEND.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: イントゥー・ザ・ネイチャー

REGULAR.description:
The typeTheEND and typeZERO go head to head as the Gekko and the Izumo play a game of chicken. Inside the Coralian, Renton, Eureka, and Anemone share a common dream—that may turn out to be a nightmare.
Source: crunchyroll

The Coralian has disappeared, but more questions about the connection between Anemone, Eureka, and Renton are raised when they meet face to face, leading to a medicine-collecting side mission in a nearby town.
Source: crunchyroll

The Gekko has been seriously damaged from its battle with the military, and its crewmembers reflect on the recent events. Stoner offers up his own speculations as to what everything means—and why Eureka was so affected by the Coralian.
Source: crunchyroll

Renton visits the town he grew up in and shows Eureka some of his important memories. Their mission is to collect a special fruit, but when Renton runs into people from his past, things take an unexpected turn.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヒューマン・ビヘイヴュア

REGULAR.description:
The Gekko lands in an abandoned mine in order to complete repairs. After a frustrating conversation with Eureka, Renton heads out to explore and stumbles upon a strange building in the mine tunnels.
Source: crunchyroll

If the Gekko is going to be repaired, it’s going to need a whole lot of reflection tape. Luckily, there’s a craftsman nearby who can make it, but only if Renton and the others can gather enough skyfish for raw materials.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スカイ・ロック・ゲート

REGULAR.description:
A miner still working in the abandoned tunnels where the Gekko is being repaired befriends members of the crew. But the old man’s intentions are called into question when he discovers the typeZero Nirvash.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: イル コミュニケーション

REGULAR.description:
Eureka’s health and spirits are fading—possibly because of the mines—which lead her to take brash action, endangering herself and others. Meanwhile, an enemy ship heads toward the Gekko, intent on taking the ship and its crew any way they can.
Source: crunchyroll

Eureka has merged with a scub, sending many of the crew into a panic. At the same time, Holland responds to a distress call and goes on a dangerous mission to rescue a Vodarac high priest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: サブスタンス アビューズ

REGULAR.description:
The Vodarac priest that Holland rescued manages to remove the scub from Eureka’s body, but the ordeal won’t be without scars. Meanwhile, Renton tries to come to terms with the death and destruction he’s caused since joining Gekkostate.
Source: crunchyroll

The Gekko crew tries to figure out the best way to tell Eureka that Renton has gone. Renton comes across Charles and Ray Beams and their carrier ship, the Swan, and decides to join them.
Source: crunchyroll

On his first mission with the Beams, Renton is faced with a difficult decision concerning the fate of a Vodarac girl. On the Gekko, Holland tries to avoid talking to Eureka about Renton, but he won’t be able to avoid the subject forever.
Source: crunchyroll

Holland considers his previous treatment of Renton as a lonely Eureka takes on the missing boy’s duties. Meanwhile, on the Swan, the Beams’ true mission comes to light, much to Renton’s shock.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: パラダイス ロスト

REGULAR.description:
Alone and wandering, Renton wears himself out searching for the Gekko. He’s taken in by a hermit and his sick wife, who have much to teach him about love and loyalty.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ワールズ・エンド・ガーデン

REGULAR.description:
Holland’s quest to find Renton hits a snag when the Gekko runs into a military fleet preparing to take on the ship. Unable to wait, Eureka leaves to search for him on her own—but Renton might be closer than she thinks.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: モーニング・グローリー

REGULAR.description:
Eureka and Renton find themselves locked in the brig together, along with Eureka’s “kids.” Their reunion is cut short when Charles and Ray Beams begin their assault on the Gekko.
Source: crunchyroll

A death in the battle between the Swan and the Gekko has major psychological consequences for members of both crews. Meanwhile, Holland reveals to Renton that he has a past connection to the Beams.
Source: crunchyroll

Lieutenant Dominic visits Bellforest and ends up spending a lot of time with the Thurstons. On the Gekko, a shocking revelation about Eureka’s origins takes everyone by surprise.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キープ・オン・ムービン

REGULAR.description:
More information about the history of Euruka and the typeZERO—and Renton’s grandfather—is revealed as the Nirvash is taken for repairs at the research center where it was built.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チェンジ・オブ・ライフ

REGULAR.description:
Repairs on the Nirvash continue as Dr. Eagan, a renowned researcher, has an idea as to why the machine has been acting strangely. Elsewhere, one of the Sages and Colonel Dewey discuss the future of the Coralians.
Source: crunchyroll

Renton’s grandfather is put in charge of upgrades for the Nirvash. Improvements can’t come soon enough, as an attack on the Coralians results in an all-out battle and the deployment of typeTheEND.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スタート・イット・アップ

REGULAR.description:
The Gekko lands amid the city ruins left by the Coralian attack. As Renton tries desperately to figure out a way to cheer Eureka up, Holland and Talho have an important conversation that affects the entire future of Gekkostate.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: パシフィック・ステイト

REGULAR.description:
Holland reveals the truth about who Norb is and how he is connected to Eureka, Talho makes a shocking announcement, and Colonel Dewey and Norb discuss the future of the planet in the capital.
Source: crunchyroll

Gekkostate attacks the capital in order to rescue Norb, but Eureka’s unwillingness to take any more lives hinders the operation. Colonel Dewey is quick to dismiss the assault, not knowing that Holland has succeeded in finding Eureka a partner.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アストラル・アパッチ

REGULAR.description:
Newly rescued Norb insists on returning to the Vodarac homeland, Eureka worries about improving her physical appearance, and Holland tells Renton about his first love—someone Renton knows all too well.
Source: crunchyroll

Norb and Dr. Bear discuss the “Limit of Questions” theory, pitting science against religion. Meanwhile, Dewey makes a very public announcement about his plans for the future, which tie back to Renton’s father.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: レイズ・ユア・ハンド

REGULAR.description:
A misunderstanding between Renton and Eureka leads to awkwardness for the rest of the Gekko’s crew. Meanwhile, Dewey continues his crusade against the Sage Council, and Stoner tries to improve public perception of Gekkostate through Ray=Out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: デイト・オブ・バース

REGULAR.description:
At Norb’s insistence, Gekkostate plays a game of soccer against a professional team. In the capital, Dewey blames two high-profile deaths on the Coralians and prepares to destroy them in return.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ジョイン ザ フューチャー

REGULAR.description:
The Gekko arrives at the Vodarac Shrine near the Great Wall, and Norb sends Renton and Eureka inside to meet with Sakuya. Elsewhere, Dewey prepares his attack squad, which includes Anemone and a new ship, the Ginga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: コズミック トリガー

REGULAR.description:
Eureka enters in a strange place within the Vodarac shrine, where she learns the history of Sakuya and Norb. Outside the shrine, Holland and the rest of Gekkostate fight a military attack.
Source: crunchyroll

Holland and Gekkostate continue to defend the shrine and provide cover while Renton and Eureka head for the Great Wall in the typeZERO—but to succeed, the Nirvash is going to have to avoid military ships, Coralians, and Anemone.
Source: crunchyroll

Eureka, Renton, and the kids finally make it to Earth, but have no idea what to do once they’re there. Meanwhile Dewey takes Anemone to a celebration and tells her about his childhood and past with Holland.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ザ サンシャイン アンダーグラウンド

REGULAR.description:
In Warsaw, Dominic visits a facility where young girls are being experimented on with tragic consequences. On Earth, the group is not faring well, and something odd is happening to Eureka.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: イッツ・オール・イン・ザ・マインド

REGULAR.description:
Jurgens and Dominic board the Gekko and confront Dr. Bear. After learning the truth about the Scub Corals, they begin to question their allegiances. On Earth, stress builds between Renton and the kids regarding Eureka’s transformation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドント・ユー・ウォント・ミー?

REGULAR.description:
When Dewey finally discovers the Scub Control Cluster, military forces launch across the world and Holland readies his crew for battle. Eureka and the kids on earth treat Renton’s fever, and the couple has a touching moment.
Source: crunchyroll

After entering the Scub Control Cluster, Renton is reunited with his sister and learns how the Coralian came to be. It seems as though the fate of everything depends on what actions he decides to take.
Source: crunchyroll

Dewey is able to create a hole in the Scub Coral that Anemone can slip through. Will Dominic be able to stop her from carrying out her suicide mission?
Source: crunchyroll

Dewey manages to destroy the Scub Control Cluster, sending debris floating on Trapar waves flying across the globe. Eureka and Renton try to control a badly damaged Nirvash, but they find unexpected resistance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シャウト・トゥ・ザ・トップ!

REGULAR.description:
The fate of the world is at stake as Eureka begins to turn into the next Scub Control Cluster. As an army of Coralians surround her, Renton understands that to save Eureka and everybody else, he might have to forsake his humanity.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: When You Wish Upon a Star
緊急特番 ナビゲーション "ray=out"
京田監督インタビュー

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 交響詩篇エウレカセブン

titles.title: ยูเรก้า เซเว่น
交響詩篇エウレカセブン
